text: {{Infobox writer | name = Don DeLillo | image = Don delillo nyc 02.jpg | image_size = 280px | caption = DeLillo in New York City, January 2011 | birth_date = | birth_place = New York City, United States | death_date = | death_place = | occupation = Novelist | notableworks = White Noise, Libra, Mao II, Underworld, Cosmopolis | movement = Postmodern | nationality = American | website = }} Don DeLillo (born November 20, 1936) is an American author.
